programme.title: Screening Humanity
programme.desc: "Screening Humanity" is a new kind of documentary that is a continuous series of thirty-minute episodes and is different from 60-minute documentaries that end with a final conclusion. Different from the cold viewpoint of the camera that follows the serene everyday life of the main characters, the view in the camera lens is like an episode of a drama. "Screening Humanity" is the view through a microscope. The lens captures the everyday life of our surroundings and presents the people's story.(n)

Different from the cold viewpoint of the camera that follows the serene everyday life of the main characters, the view in the camera lens is like an episode of a drama. "Screening Humanity" is the view through a microscope. The lens captures the everyday life of our surroundings and presents the people's story.(n)

programme.title: Man in a Veil
programme.desc: This drama is about a miracle.A mother who is accused of murder and a wife who stole the property. The story tells about a miracle comes to a man who lost his evidence due to his physical limitations.(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Sisters
programme.desc: “Mystery, thriller, comedy and romance all together! This show begins with a murder case of a woman that happened during a divorce suit and all of her family members are pointed as murder suspects.”.(n)

programme.title: You Heeyul's Sketchbook
programme.desc: Acclaimed musician You Heeyeol of the project group "Toy", is a familiar name to music lovers. This is where you can enjoy the energetic performances of talented musicians and their sweet, friendly conversations. It's a relaxing and pleasant gift for you after a long hard day. Enjoy a night of delightful music and conversation at "You Heeyul's Sketchbook".(n)

programme.title: Police University
programme.desc: A real campus story at a police university that was veiled.(n)

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. But, they are here for various reasons, such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society will be unfolded!(n)

programme.title: Boss in the Mirror
programme.desc: Korean celebrity-bosses go through self-examinations to create better working environment for their employees.(n)

programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King," Lee Gyenggyu, who's also known for his love for dogs and the country's most famous dog expert, Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how the humans and the pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: Immortal Songs
programme.desc: The true classic of the century is born again! The legendary classic which is reinterpreted by the best idol groups in Korea & their incredible singing skills which was yet to be spotted! The idols who sing the legend! The heart-moving moments that transcends generations, don't miss their beautiful competition!(n)

programme.desc: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.(n)

programme.title: BILL & TED FACE THE MUSIC
programme.desc: Once told they'd save the universe during a time-traveling adventure, 2 would-be rockers from San Dimas, California find themselves as middle-aged dads still trying to crank out a hit song and fulfill their destiny.(n)

programme.title: Professionals
programme.desc: Peter's fears about Zora are confirmed when Vincent and his team run a surveillance operation which she reveals her intentions to betray Peter and take control of the Swann corporation.(n)

programme.title: MORTAL ENGINES
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: STAR TREK BEYOND
programme.desc: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy.(n)

programme.title: STAR TREK BEYOND
programme.desc: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy.(n)

programme.title: RUN HIDE FIGHT
programme.desc: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.(n)

programme.title: SYNCHRONIC
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, otherworldly effects.(n)

programme.title: THE SECRET: DARE TO DREAM
programme.desc: A widow struggling to get by meets a stranger who subscribes to a philosophy of positive thinking.(n)

programme.title: CORPORATE ANIMALS
programme.desc: CEO Lucy takes her staff on corporate team building in some underground desert caves in New Mexico. They get stuck there.(n)

programme.title: A MILLION WAYS TO DIE IN THE WEST
programme.desc: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his newly found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.(n)

programme.title: Professionals
programme.desc: Peter's fears about Zora are confirmed when Vincent and his team run a surveillance operation which she reveals her intentions to betray Peter and take control of the Swann corporation.(n)

programme.title: MORTAL ENGINES
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world where cities ride on wheels and consume each other to survive, two people meet in London and try to stop a conspiracy.(n)

programme.title: CAN YOU KEEP A SECRET?
programme.desc: Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. Later she realize the stranger is her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her.(n)

programme.title: OCCUPATION: RAINFALL
programme.desc: Two years after aliens land on Earth, survivors from Sydney, Australia, fight in a desperate war as the number of casualties continue to grow.(n)

programme.title: THE HUNT FOR RED OCTOBER
programme.desc: A deadly battle of wits ensues between the navies of the United States and the U.S.S.R when the Soviet Union's most advanced nuclear submarine makes an unauthorized approach to America's eastern seaboard.(n)

programme.title: AMERICAN MADE
programme.desc: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.(n)

programme.title: SILK ROAD
programme.desc: Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.(n)
